title: "Get top referrals"

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get top referrals"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/user/referrals/top/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint retrieves the top 100 users with the most referrals. It aggregates referral data and returns user details such as username and avatar URL.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"success":{"value":{"statusCode":200,"message":"Top referrals found","error":null,"users":[{"_id":"referrer_id","count":10,"user":{"username":"exampleUser","avatarUrl":"https://example.com/avatar.jpg"}}]}}}}}},"400":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"invalidInput":{"value":{"statusCode":400,"message":"Invalid input","error":"Bad request"}}}}}},"500":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"serverError":{"value":{"statusCode":500,"message":"Internal server error, check the details.","error":"Internal server error","details":"Error details"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
